articles.description: Apple is a company that turns pretty much every little thing into a money-making machine, and now the Cupertino-based tech giant has reportedly set its eyes on a subscription-based podcast service.
articles.content: Apple has long had a Podcasts app on its platforms, but this time, the company is trying a completely different approach. And according to reports, what it wants to do is to release a podcast service… [+1406 chars]

articles.title: A redesigned Asus ROG Phone 4 with blazing fast charging might be closer than you think - PhoneArena
articles.description: The gaming-centric Asus ROG Phone 4 (or ROG Phone 5) could be right around the corner with a Snapdragon 888 SoC, 65W charging support, and possibly, an entirely new design.
